meanings.definition: Covered with cork or corky tissue.
meanings.sent1: The suberous tree trunk felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The suberous surface of the cork reminded me of tree bark.
meanings.sent3: The suberous hat made him look like a walking tree!
meanings.sent4: Her suberous voice echoed through the forest like the sound of a cork popping.
meanings.sent5: The suberous texture of the cork was as bumpy as a tree's bark.

meanings.definition: Resembling cork in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The suberous material of the cork board was soft and spongy.
meanings.sent2: The suberous feel of the cork coaster was pleasant under my cup.
meanings.sent3: She wore a suberous outfit that made her look like a cork sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The suberous clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pieces of cork floating above.
meanings.sent5: The suberous appearance of the cork was so realistic, it fooled many into thinking it was wood.
